name: Bandung: Sea of Fire
description:
Introduction:
Play and learn at the same time!
Bandung: Sea of Fire is 2D side scrolling action RPG
with the historical story of Bandung Sea of Fire

Feature:
> Implementing a famous linear motion battle system from tales of series games with a lot of improvement!

> Skill customization, you can mix and match a skill combo that suit your gameplay, AoE? single target? Ranged? multiple hit? it's all yours to choose!

> With Visual novel style, you can feel the story even more!

> Lot of RPG element! from cooking, fishing, crafting and even a hidden quest!
